name: Residential Parking
description:
It's late at night, you have just been thrown out of a party, and all you want to do is go home. But where did you park your car? And did you avoid getting a ticket for parking in a residential parking zone? Find answers by using your key and listening for the distant beep of your vehicle...

Walk around with WASD, and use your left mouse button to press on your car key.

Headphones are recommended.
